Select one of 0 countries:
Current value: US
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; export interface Country { description: string, id: string } @Component({ selector: 'app-exercise1', templateUrl: './exercise1.component.html', styleUrls: ['./exercise1.component.css'] }) export class Exercise1Component implements OnInit { public countriesData:Country[] = []; constructor( private http:HttpClient ) { } ngOnInit() { this.http.get('https://bookish-space-garbanzo-wqrg6rppjvjf5xgq-3000.app.github.dev/countries').subscribe(data =>{ this.countriesData = data; }); } }
